results.title: Effects of simvastatin on mandibular distraction osteogenesis.
results.text_hl: PURPOSE: The aim of this study was to evaluate the effects of local and systemic @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ application on @<m>DISEASE_Osteogenesis_Imperfecta</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010013 @@@distraction osteogenesis@@@.

citations.NLM: Kiliç E, Ozeç I, Yeler H, Korkmaz A, Ayas B, Gümüş C. Effects of simvastatin on mandibular distraction osteogenesis. J Oral Maxillofac Surg. 2008 Nov;66(11):2233-8. PMID: 18940485

results.title: Alpha-5 Integrin Mediates Simvastatin-Induced Osteogenesis of Bone Marrow Mesenchymal Stem Cells
results.text_hl: @CHEMICAL_Alizarin_Red_S @CHEMICAL_MESH:C004468 @@@Alizarin red S@@@ (@CHEMICAL_Calcium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002118 @@@calcium@@@ deposition) and alkaline phosphatase (ALP) staining were used to evaluate @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SVS@@@-induced @<m>DISEASE_Osteogenesis_Imperfecta</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010013 @@@osteogenesis@@@ of @CELLLINE_CVCL:RG58 @@@D1@@@ cells.

citations.NLM: Shao PL, Wu SC, Lin ZY, Ho ML, Chen CH, Wang CZ. Alpha-5 Integrin Mediates Simvastatin-Induced Osteogenesis of Bone Marrow Mesenchymal Stem Cells Int J Mol Sci. 2019 Jan 24;20(3):. PMID: 30682874
